page.title: 08EMBLEMS JAZZ BAND
page.content: The band which we have on our estate is called the Knottingley Emblems Juvenile Jazz Band.We get our name from all the different badges or emblems we wear on our uniforms.There are 32 band members aged between 4 and 18,with others waiting to join.We practice once a week and enter competitions twice a week in the band season,which runs from June to August. Our instruments are kazoos,cymbals, bass drum,side drums and bell-lyres, but we also have majors,mascots, banner holders and baton twirlers who don't play instruments.In exhibitions we first do a road march followed by a display of pattern marching in a field.Later in the day we finish with presentations to the best individuals from each band,the best sections from each band and the best band overall.
